segments.text: Melissa ? I ’ d like to invite you to my wife ’ s birthday party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Frank . I ’ d love to come . When is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Her birthday is on the 9th . We ’ re going to have dinner at a Mexican restaurant , and then maybe go out dancing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like fun . You can count me in ! Just give me directions to the restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2
